metadata.title: CVE-2019-19709 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
MediaWiki through 1.33.1 allows attackers to bypass the Title_blacklist protection mechanism by starting with an arbitrary title, establishing a non-resolvable redirect for the associated page, and using redirect=1 in the action API when editing that page.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19709` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.31.6-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.31.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.6-1').
